what: Load from Cache, Update if New Lineages Found or Create Cache if Missing
title: CCT Hierarchy Functions
text: Cache written basic ‘rda’ file user’s local AppData directory overwrite cache update new lineages compared cache force argument forcibly returns lineages file specified regardless compares cache Can supply either lineages_url aliases_url target specific files updateHierarchies()
code: library(CCT) # Grab an older version cachedat <- checkCache(lineages_url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cov-lineages/pango-designation/4b5957e151c10e92cb49e9df904c0b2ea841f3eb/lineage_notes.txt") ## title: CCT Hierarchy Functions
text: Building documentation time master file broken linking specifically

title: CCT Hierarchy Functions
text: Lineages: https://github.com/cov-lineages/pango-designation/blob/master/lineage_notes.txt Aliases: https://github.com/cov-lineages/pango-designation/blob/master/pango_designation/alias_key.json Can supply specific local file version files Reports file failed one Returns table Parent/Lineage/Children
code: l <- CCT::updateHierarchies(lineages_url = "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/TheZetner/pango-designation/master/lineage_notes.txt")  head(l) ##    lineage parent children ## 1        A   <NA>        A ## 35     A.1      A      A.1 ## 3        A   <NA>      A.1 ## 41     A.2      A      A.2 ## 5        A   <NA>      A.2 ## 44   A.2.2    A.2    A.2.2

title: CCT Hierarchy Functions
text: Take dataframe updateHierarchies() build node network using data.tree Defines parent-child relationship node (lineage) Also returns table “orphan” lineages missing parents table break network removed

previous_headings: Pull all the Ancestors of a Node
title: CCT Hierarchy Functions
code: ancestors <- pullAncestors(ll$network, "BA.5.2", table = FALSE) ancestors ##                        levelName ## 1 MRCA                           ## 2  °--B                          ## 3      °--B.1                    ## 4          °--B.1.1              ## 5              °--B.1.1.529      ## 6                  °--BA.5       ## 7                      °--BA.5.2

previous_headings: Pull all the Ancestors of a Node
title: CCT Hierarchy Functions
code: ancestors <- pullAncestors(ll$network, "BA.5.2", table = TRUE) ancestors ##                        levelName level   lineage ## 1 MRCA                               1      MRCA ## 2  °--B                              2         B ## 3      °--B.1                        3       B.1 ## 4          °--B.1.1                  4     B.1.1 ## 5              °--B.1.1.529          5 B.1.1.529 ## 6                  °--BA.5           6      BA.5 ## 7                      °--BA.5.2     7    BA.5.2

previous_headings: Pull all the Ancestors of a Node
title: CCT Hierarchy Functions
code: # vector supersedes table param ancestors <- pullAncestors(ll$network, "BA.5.2", table = TRUE, vector = TRUE) ancestors ## [1] "MRCA"      "B"         "B.1"       "B.1.1"     "B.1.1.529" "BA.5"      ## [7] "BA.5.2"

title: Using CCT Functions
text: Create long table constellations one line per mutation per constellation Clone cov-lineages constellations repo data/constellations Pull constellations constellationsToTable() Received table label, variant, Gene, Mutation,
code: filelist <- list.files("data/constellations/constellations/definition", full.names = T)  l <- purrr::map(filelist, ~ constellationToTable(.x))  constellations <- dplyr::bind_rows(l)  dplyr::glimpse(constellations) ``

title: Authors and Citation
text: Adrian Zetner. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Zetner (2023). CCT: Common Covid Tasks. R package version 0.5.2,  https://thezetner.github.io/cct/, https://github.com/TheZetner/cct.
code: @Manual{,   title = {CCT: Common Covid Tasks},   author = {Adrian Zetner},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.5.2,  https://thezetner.github.io/cct/},   url = {https://github.com/TheZetner/cct}, }

title: Common Covid Tasks
text: CCT combines number commonly requested covid related tasks easy(ish) use package. Create node network hierarchy pangolin lineages aliases Cache data locally case remote data access problems Query network ancestors descendants lineage Parse constellations easily used table Parse covariants.org variant table Expand variants table children Sort lineages ancestry instead alnum

title: Common Covid Tasks
text: Clone Git Repository Install Locally install.packages("cct", repos = NULL, type="source") remotes::install_local("cct") Install Github remotes::install_github("TheZetner/cct")

title: Check Cache vs Current — checkCache
text: Checks cache file, makes one exist, updates date, loads otherwise. Returns list cached values. Option skip overwrite cache just return lineages. Custom target files updateHierarchies() can supplied using aliases_url lineages_url

title: Check Cache vs Current — checkCache
text: overwrite set false compare cache file return data ... Pass alternate lineages_url aliases_url updateHierarchies

title: Check Cache vs Current — checkCache
text: list three elements lineages list fixed aliases hierarchy list Node class network object describing hierarchy lineages table -called orphan lineages call non-existent parents file.info output showing recent update time cache new lineages cache update new aliases cache update

title: Parse Website Constellations from — constellationToTable
text: https://github.com/cov-lineages/constellations/

title: Parse Website Constellations from — constellationToTable
text: x location cloned constellations root dir

title: Parse Website Constellations from — constellationToTable
text: table constellation mutations label, variants, mutations

what: Get Descendants of a Table of Lineages — expandChildren
title: Get Descendants of a Table of Lineages — expandChildren
text: Using covariants variants table network provided updateHierarchy checkChache

title: Get Descendants of a Table of Lineages — expandChildren
Get Descendants of a Table of Lineages — expandChildren
text: x Table lineages (lineage column necessary) network Network produced fromDFtoNetwork() unique child one parent

title: Get Descendants of a Table of Lineages — expandChildren
text: table children added child column

what: Build Lineage Node Network from Dataframe — fromDFtoNetwork
title: Build Lineage Node Network from Dataframe — fromDFtoNetwork
text: Take dataframe parent child relationships create node network can queried relationships . Also returns table orphans missing parents break network

title: Build Lineage Node Network from Dataframe — fromDFtoNetwork
Build Lineage Node Network from Dataframe — fromDFtoNetwork
text: x Dataframe updateHierarchies()

title: Build Lineage Node Network from Dataframe — fromDFtoNetwork
text: list two elements Node class network object describing hierarchy lineages table -called orphan lineages call non-existent parents

what: Get Descendants from a Specific Lineage — getDescendants
title: Get Descendants from a Specific Lineage — getDescendants
text: Get lineage's descendants fromDFtoNetwork()node network. Vector TRUE supersedes table TRUE. Default return node network.

title: Get Descendants from a Specific Lineage — getDescendants
code: getDescendants(x, node_name, table = FALSE, vector = FALSE)

title: Get Descendants from a Specific Lineage — getDescendants
text: x node network produce fromDFtoNetwork() node_name Lineage interest ie. "BA.1" table logical, return tree dataframe level/lineage vector logical, return vector  lineage names

title: Get Descendants from a Specific Lineage — getDescendants
text: one three options depending table vector params Node class network object nodes beneath node_name table node network level lineage names vector lineage names

title: Get CoVariants.org Tracked Variants — getVariants
text: Grab tracked variants table cleaned tibble version .

title: Get CoVariants.org Tracked Variants — getVariants
text: variants_url Point different version necessary

title: Get CoVariants.org Tracked Variants — getVariants
text: table lineage, clade, (designation)

what: Make a Watchlist Appropriate to Augur — makeWatchlist
title: Make a Watchlist Appropriate to Augur — makeWatchlist
text: Uses character vector lineage names output yaml array Augur. Vector can manually produced getDescendants()

title: Make a Watchlist Appropriate to Augur — makeWatchlist
Make a Watchlist Appropriate to Augur — makeWatchlist
text: x Vector lineage names

title: Make a Watchlist Appropriate to Augur — makeWatchlist
text: YAML ready array

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: See magrittr::%>% details.

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: lhs value magrittr placeholder. rhs function call using magrittr semantics.

title: Pipe operator — %>%
text: result calling rhs(lhs).

what: Pull Ancestors from a Specific Lineage — pullAncestors
title: Pull Ancestors from a Specific Lineage — pullAncestors
text: Get lineages ancestors fromDFtoNetwork()node network. Vector TRUE supersedes table TRUE. Default return node network.

title: Pull Ancestors from a Specific Lineage — pullAncestors
code: pullAncestors(x, node_name, table = FALSE, vector = FALSE)

title: Pull Ancestors from a Specific Lineage — pullAncestors
text: x node network produce fromDFtoNetwork() node_name Lineage interest ie. "BA.1" table logical, return subtree dataframe level/lineage vector logical, return vector  lineage names

title: Pull Ancestors from a Specific Lineage — pullAncestors
text: one two options depending table param Node class network object nodes leading node_name table node network level lineage names vector lineage names

title: Sort Lineages — sortLineages
text: Sort lineages properly order defined sublineages eg. < .1 < .2 < .2.1 < .2.2 < .2.3 < .2.4 < .2.5 < .2.5.1 rather : .1 < .10 < .11 < .12 < .13 < .14

title: Sort Lineages — sortLineages
text: x Table lineage column sort column Name lineage column 'lineage'

title: Sort Lineages — sortLineages
text: Table arranges lineages correct order

title: Find Unique List Elements — uniqueListElements
text: Find Unique List Elements

title: Find Unique List Elements — uniqueListElements
text: list sorted list vectors

title: Find Unique List Elements — uniqueListElements
text: list list elements non-overlapping contents

what: Update PANGO Hierarchies from Github Files — updateHierarchies
title: Update PANGO Hierarchies from Github Files — updateHierarchies
text: Cov-lineages curates file contains lineages one contains aliases. Use modified code Julie Chen build hierarchy table.

title: Update PANGO Hierarchies from Github Files — updateHierarchies
Update PANGO Hierarchies from Github Files — updateHierarchies
text: aliases_url cov-lineages alias_key.json lineages_url cov-lineages lineages_notes.txt

title: Update PANGO Hierarchies from Github Files — updateHierarchies
text: dataframe parent/lineage/children long format
